feature.label: langlocker-feature
feature.description:
Blocks unwanted input language switches (like English to Russian) while working in IDE.
In order to lock the current input language, run the 'Lock/unlock input language' command, or click on the corresponding button on the top panel, which looks like a lock with 'EN' chracters on it. In order to unlock, do the same thing again.
